items.title: Amazon Faces Rare Downgrade—Is the Rally at Risk?
items.description: Despite the downgrade, Amazon’s solid fundamentals, supportive technicals, and near-unanimous analyst conviction suggest its rally is still intact.

items.title: CrowdStrike Tests $412 Support as Options Traders Turn Bullish
items.description: Options activity and technical signals suggest bulls are betting on a short-term rebound in CRWD stock despite recent post-earnings weakness

items.title: Dueling Insider Moves: Heavy Buying Here, Big Selling There
items.description: Private equity is spending big to buy into a little-known building stock. Meanwhile, one of the biggest winners in tech just saw its CEO sell millions...

items.title: Alibaba Rallies on New AI Chip Design, Sending NVIDIA Stock Lower
items.description: Alibaba has entered the AI chipmaking race, responding to NVIDIA pulling out of the market by not selling H20 cihps to China anymore.

items.title: Loop Industries Insiders Buy Stock, Signal Confidence in Outlook
items.description: Loop Industries insiders are buying this stock, signalling increased confidence in the outlook for commercializing its technology.
